Why are trees so carefree and happy in spring? Because they finally leaf their worries behind!
Why is everyone so tired on April 1st? They just finished a 31-day March.
Why did the gardener plant a seed in his computer? He wanted to download spring!
What's spring's favorite kind of pickles? Daffo-dills!
What did the big flower say to the little flower? Hi, bud!
What do you call a snowman in April? A puddle.
Why do birds fly south in the Spring? It's quicker than walking!
How excited was the garden about spring? So excited it wet its plants!
